subject: Nutrition and Dietetics
Physical Therapy, Sports Therapy and Rehabilitation
Medicine (miscellaneous)

assertion.value: All participating pregnant women signed written informed consent for themselves and on behalf of their offspring at enrolment. The study received ethical approval from the National Healthcare Group Domain Specific Review Board and the SingHealth Centralised Institutional Review Board.
assertion.name: Ethics

group.name: EthicsHeading
group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate

assertion.value: KMG and YSC report receiving reimbursement for speaking at conferences sponsored by companies selling nutritional products. KMG and YSC report being part of an academic consortium that has received research funding from Abbott Nutrition, Nestle and Danone. All other authors have no conflict of interest to declare.
assertion.name: Ethics
